title: President Trump applied for an early re-election to stop the political discourse of a lucrative third party?
subtitle: Legal experts do not believe that President Trump ' s request for early re-election would have a significant impact on the activities of non-profit and non-governmental organizations.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: President Trump has advanced his early re-election, which means that non-profit organizations cannot criticize him without losing their tax-free status.
